destination__body: The city is full of historical attractions and monuments, but also boasts many fashion boutiques, stylish restaurants and designer stores. The city is feeling chic, embracing a new coolness
impression__subtitle: This transcontinental metropolis is a melting pot of booming culture, a mix of culinary celebrations, art and architecture, separated by the awe-inspiring Bosphorus Strait, which you won't want to miss.
accom__subtitle: Выберите идеальный отель для брони прямо сейчас!
contacts__addres: City of Turkestan, Regional administrative and business center, 160 block, House Administration
